availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky miller. Kentucky native. Married to Martha E. Whitnell. Father of Florentine L. Whintell, Lee C. Whitnell, and Mary L. Whitnell.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, Briensburg, p. 7. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Calloway County, Murray Precinct, p. 43. Find A Grave, "John W Whitnel (1830-1921)," Memorial #25296721, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=25296721 (accessed 14 June 2016).
